response: the person who is wearing the glasses can receive multiple information, ... but for the other person it's just talk.
don't know what's happening from the other side
the proximity I feel with them correlates with how much freedom they have with the filters.
A bird pooped on me. Now I feel terrible. My appearance isn't great I don't want to be recorded or filtered in any sort of way. It would depend on my feeling for my appearance, for that moment.
[primary users] have a choice, [but] people who do not wear the glasses... do not have a choice... to be recorded or not
